note.p: Farmer. Landowner in Down, 1851. Leased Lilly’s Farm in Chelsfield, Kent, from 1854.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1606/253/16)
Copus, Geoffrey. Catalogue of Harris Manuscripts relating mainly to Chelsfield 1503–1914 (www.kentarchaeology.org.uk/Research/01/CHL/02.htm, accessed 29 March 2017)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 29 March 2017)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 29 March 2017)
